span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 促进，鼓励： to help the growth or development of
【例】 detect and foster artistic talent 发现并培养艺术天分
【近】 advance, encourage, forward, further, incubate, promote
【反】 discourage, frustrate, inhibit 阻碍，妨碍

【考法 2】 vt. 培养： to bring to maturity through care and education
【例】 a greathearted couple fostering two adopted children as well as their own对两个养子像自己的孩子一样培养的好心夫妇
【近】 breed, cultivate, nourish, nurse, nurture, raise, rear

【记】 源自food；音：服伺他，指服伺小孩，老人；要faster，得foster
